ygData.subject: Re: memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: the spell takes about 15 minutes to show up the same goes for once you use it...you can only cast it once every 15 minutes Bree Nightingale ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
the spell takes about 15 minutes to show up the same goes for once you use
it...you can only cast it once every 15 minutes
Bree Nightingale

-----Original Message-----
From: cbennett@... <cbennett@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 11:43 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] memmed spells


>From: cbennett@...
>
>I have a 5th level HIE cleric and I recently purchased divine aura
>(the requirements being 5th level) and I scribed it ok, but when I
>memorize it, it never fully shows up in the slot. It just remains
>kinda gray, and if I click on it it says I haven't recovered yet.
>What does that mean? And why can't I memorize it?
>
>
>>From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
>>
>>As coot pointed out, you will constantly need to mem new spells
>>depending on what you are fighting. However, I always keep my best
>>hp/ac buff in (center right now seeing as i'm only lvl 17), root, divine
>>aura, and a heal spell. The others vary on what i'm fighting and
>>whether or not i'm grouped or solo.
